    • Constructor Detail

      • Product

        public Product(int productID,
               int sellerID,
               java.lang.String brand,
               java.lang.String pName,
               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> colors,
               java.lang.String itemType,
               java.lang.String size,
               java.sql.Timestamp timePosted,
               java.lang.String descrip,
               java.util.ArrayList<Tag> tags,
               double rentPrice,
               double buyPrice,
               int interest,
               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> imagePaths,
               java.util.ArrayList<Comment> comments)
        Product constructor with all parameters for database retrievals.
        Parameters:
        productID - The primary key ID of this product.
        sellerID - The primary key ID of the seller offering this product.
        brand - The brand of this product.
        pName - The name of this product. For example, in "Nike Air Force 1", the name would be "Air Force 1".
        colors - The colors of this product.
        itemType - The type of Product. For example "shirt", "jeans", or "shoes".
        size - The size of this item, null by default, all standardized to strings to conform to guidelines for a wide variety of products.
        timePosted - The time the product was posted to the website.
        descrip - The description the seller provides for the product.
        tags - ArrayList of Tag objects regarding this product.
        rentPrice - The rental price of this product per unit, pass 0 if the user is not offering this product as a rental.
        buyPrice - The outright purchase price of this product per unit, pass 0 if the user is not offering this product for purchase.
        interest - A counter of the number of users indicating interest in this product.
        imagePaths - ArrayList of Strings where each element is the path to an image of this product.
        comments - ArrayList of Comment objects regarding this product.

      • Product

        public Product(int sellerID,
               java.lang.String pName,
               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> colors,
               java.lang.String itemType,
               java.lang.String size,
               java.lang.String descrip,
               java.util.ArrayList<Tag> tags,
               double rentPrice,
               double buyPrice,
               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> imagePaths)
        Overloaded Product constructor called by frontend when user is adding a project without a brand name, but with tags.
        Parameters:
        sellerID - The primary key ID of the seller offering this product.
        pName - The name of this product. For example, in "Nike Air Force 1", the name would be "Air Force 1".
        colors - The colors of this product.
        itemType - The type of Product. For example "shirt", "jeans", or "shoes".
        size - The size of this item, null by default, all standardized to strings to conform to guidelines for a wide variety of products.
        descrip - The description the seller provides for the product.
        tags - ArrayList of Tag objects regarding this product.
        rentPrice - The rental price of this product per unit, pass 0 if the user is not offering this product as a rental.
        buyPrice - The outright purchase price of this product per unit, pass 0 if the user is not offering this product for purchase.
        imagePaths - ArrayList of Strings where each element is the path to an image of this product.

      • Product

        public Product(int sellerID,
               java.lang.String pName,
               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> colors,
               java.lang.String itemType,
               java.lang.String size,
               java.lang.String descrip,
               double rentPrice,
               double buyPrice,
               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> imagePaths)
        Basic Product constructor called by frontend when user is adding a product without tags or a brand name.
        Parameters:
        sellerID - The primary key ID of the seller offering this product.
        pName - The name of this product. For example, in "Nike Air Force 1", the name would be "Air Force 1".
        colors - The colors of this product.
        itemType - The type of Product. For example "shirt", "jeans", or "shoes".
        size - The size of this item, null by default, all standardized to strings to conform to guidelines for a wide variety of products.
        descrip - The description the seller provides for the product.
        rentPrice - The rental price of this product per unit, pass 0 if the user is not offering this product as a rental.
        buyPrice - The outright purchase price of this product per unit, pass 0 if the user is not offering this product for purchase.
        imagePaths - ArrayList of Strings where each element is the path to an image of this product.

      • Product

        public Product(int sellerID,
               java.lang.String brand,
               java.lang.String pName,
               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> colors,
               java.lang.String itemType,
               java.lang.String size,
               java.lang.String descrip,
               java.util.ArrayList<Tag> tags,
               double rentPrice,
               double buyPrice,
               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> imagePaths)
        Overloaded Product constructor called by frontend when user is adding a product with tags AND a brand name.
        Parameters:
        sellerID - The primary key ID of the seller offering this product.
        brand - The brand of this product.
        pName - The name of this product. For example, in "Nike Air Force 1", the name would be "Air Force 1".
        colors - The colors of this product.
        itemType - The type of Product. For example "shirt", "jeans", or "shoes".
        size - The size of this item, null by default, all standardized to strings to conform to guidelines for a wide variety of products.
        descrip - The description the seller provides for the product.
        tags - ArrayList of Tag objects regarding this product.
        rentPrice - The rental price of this product per unit, pass 0 if the user is not offering this product as a rental.
        buyPrice - The outright purchase price of this product per unit, pass 0 if the user is not offering this product for purchase.
        imagePaths - ArrayList of Strings where each element is the path to an image of this product.

      • Product

        public Product(int sellerID,
               java.lang.String brand,
               java.lang.String pName,
               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> colors,
               java.lang.String itemType,
               java.lang.String size,
               java.lang.String descrip,
               double rentPrice,
               double buyPrice,
               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> imagePaths)
        Overloaded Product constructor called by frontend when user is adding a project with a brand name, but without tags.
        Parameters:
        sellerID - The primary key ID of the seller offering this product.
        brand - The brand of this product.
        pName - The name of this product. For example, in "Nike Air Force 1", the name would be "Air Force 1".
        colors - The colors of this product.
        itemType - The type of Product. For example "shirt", "jeans", or "shoes".
        size - The size of this item, null by default, all standardized to strings to conform to guidelines for a wide variety of products.
        descrip - The description the seller provides for the product.
        rentPrice - The rental price of this product per unit, pass 0 if the user is not offering this product as a rental.
        buyPrice - The outright purchase price of this product per unit, pass 0 if the user is not offering this product for purchase.
        imagePaths - ArrayList of Strings where each element is the path to an image of this product.
